general.name: IT-Glue Automatic Documentation - M365 Teams [WIN]
general.description:
Documents all current Microsoft Teams
Requires setup of M365 components first. Please see documentation at help.rmm.datto.com under the CyberDrain section of the Component spreadsheet.
Related blog: https://www.cyberdrain.com/documenting-with-powershell-documenting-admin-actions/
